name: Biological Hull
desc: Hiver ships are cyberneitc in nature starting with organic hulls laced with cybernetics that regerate  %s/%s/%s/%s percent of the ships hull per second.

name: Hive Mind
desc: Due to the bio-cybernetic nature of the Hiver fleet they are able to interact with each other in a way that eliminates redundancies and boosts overall performance by  %s.
